caption.p: a) Cyclic voltammetry of single‐ and polycrystalline gold electrodes in (20 % O 2+80 % Ar)‐saturated 0.4 m Ca(ClO 4) 2 containing DMSO at 10 mV s −1) and 5 μl s −1 flow rate using a thin‐layer flow‐through cell. b) Potential‐dependent ion current for mass 32 (O 2) for single‐ and polycrystalline gold electrodes.
